channel.title: [Pi]Cannot see any npc's/characters bug fix?
channel.description:
Hello, before you read this thread I'm wondering if you have the fix for this if you don't theres no point in reading this etc and it'll save you time not reading this.
According to one of the posts by another user the issue is in player.java but this isn't verified. The link to the release thread is below http://www.[imtired]rune-[makemeasammich]server.[pie]org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/283112-pi-asgarnia-server-fullscreen-compatible.html
If not its cool, not a high priority or anything although it'd be nice to play around with. I haven't even downloaded it due to the fact I doubt I can fix it on my own and I'm on a limited bandwidth until my internet gets sorted out soon'ish so I'd rather not download unnecessary data. Cannot post errors etc due to not having a copy of it.
